title: GJ Riot You're Doomed us all

replies.body:
Chill out, it will be balanced in time.
Pre-season is always about big changes and finding balance before competition starts again.

Knee-jerk reactions are unwarranted, just give proper feedback (like you were beta testing), and watch it get sorted.
Good point... mb. little bit of an over reaction

I do like the idea of combining runes and masteries - they were a big barrier for new players trying to get into the game.

There will be tweaks - it is a pretty big departure from the evolution of their 10 year old model.

This must be your first preseason :)

Basically a preseason is when they put a whole lot of changes in preparation for the new season. Because the season isn't started, ranked games are disabled.

Preseason is the time to test game-changing changes, with reworks to whole aspects of the game. This time, it's runes and masteries. It's always a flop at first, but they figure things out and it becomes playable at the beginning of the season. Remember Thunderlords?

It's like playing on PBE, with less bugs, with servers near you, and more unbalance for a short period of time.

Riot has enough playing data on the live servers to let their data scientist extract trends, make sense of wtf is happening and analyse the impact of the preseason on the games, the players and the champions.

The only way you can help them is by playing. That's it. This will generate more data for them to analyze.

There's a reason they literally turn ranked off to make these big changes.  It happened last year, it happened the year before that.  This isn't new, just chill out and wait a bit.

Maybe in the meantime enjoy the opness :p

Pretty sure I beat a mostly AP team last night with no trouble at all.

Honestly I'd say the new Tank Runes are pretty stupid, so many ways to get free health with stacking % numbers <3
They did say that the new patch was going to be broken beyond belief.
The title says GJ riot you're doomed us all

Yeah AP champions have a natural advantage, because in the removal of standard Rune Pages of last season, you remove what is a normally natural MR bonus, and champions only got health/Armor for some stupid reason.

So every player that ran MR runes is now short ~12 MR, which is a significant change when you have just given everyone a Stronger set of Masteries (the new runes), that can do things like lower Ultimate cooldowns on champs that are Bursty.
